chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (a b a' b' : R) (delta : R -> R -> posreal), {d : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a' <= y <= b' -> ~ ~ (exists u v : R, a <= u <= b /\ a' <= v <= b' /\ Rabs (x - u) < delta u v /\ Rabs (y - v) < delta u v /\ d <= delta u v)}

Premises:
*** [ R : Set ]
Record posreal : Set := mkposreal { pos : R; cond_pos : 0 < pos } For mkposreal: Argument scopes are [R_scope _]
Rabs = fun r : R => if Rcase_abs r then - r else r : R -> R Argument scope is [R_scope]
compactness_value_1d : forall (a b : R) (delta : R -> posreal), {d : posreal | forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> ~ ~ (exists t : R, a <= t <= b /\ Rabs (x - t) < delta t /\ d <= delta t)}
Heine_cor1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | delta <= b - a /\ (forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps)}
compactness_value : forall (n : nat) (a b : Tn n R) (delta : Tn n R -> posreal), {d : posreal | forall x : Tn n R, bounded_n n a b x -> ~ ~ (exists t : Tn n R, bounded_n n a b t /\ close_n n (delta t) x t /\ d <= delta t)}
Heine_cor2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps}
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
phi_sequence_prop : forall (un : nat -> posreal) (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (pr : Riemann_integrable f a b) (N : nat), {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi_sequence un pr N t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < un N}
RiemannInt_P2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (vn wn : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> a <= b -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - vn n t) <= wn n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (wn n)) < un n) -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (vn N)) l}
RiemannInt_P11 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b l : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (phi1 phi2 psi1 psi2 : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi1 n t) <= psi1 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi1 n)) < un n) -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi2 n t) <= psi2 n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (psi2 n)) < un n) -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi1 N)) l -> Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (phi2 N)) l
compactness_list : forall (n : nat) (a b : Tn n R) (delta : Tn n R -> posreal), ~ ~ (exists l : list (Tn n R), forall x : Tn n R, bounded_n n a b x -> exists t : Tn n R, In t l /\ bounded_n n a b t /\ close_n n (delta t) x t)
RiemannInt_P3 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (un : nat -> posreal) (vn wn : nat -> StepFun a b), Un_cv (fun x : nat => un x) 0 -> (forall n : nat, (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - vn n t) <= wn n t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF (wn n)) < un n) -> {l : R | Un_cv (fun N : nat => RiemannInt_SF (vn N)) l}
StepFun_P37 : forall (a b : R) (f g : StepFun a b), a <= b -> (forall x : R, a < x < b -> f x <= g x) -> RiemannInt_SF f <= RiemannInt_SF g
StepFun_P34 : forall (a b : R) (f : StepFun a b), a <= b -> Rabs (RiemannInt_SF f) <= RiemannInt_SF {| fe := fun x : R => Rabs (f x); pre := StepFun_P32 f |}
disc = fun (x : R) (delta : posreal) (y : R) => Rabs (y - x) < delta : R -> posreal -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope _ R_scope]
uniform_continuity = fun (f : R -> R) (X : R -> Prop) => forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y : R, X x -> X y -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps : (R -> R) -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
Req_le_aux : forall x y : R, (forall eps : posreal, Rabs (x - y) <= eps) -> x = y
completeness_any : forall P : R -> Prop, (forall x y : R, x <= y -> P y -> P x) -> forall (He : exists x : R, P x) (Hb : bound P) (x : R), x < proj1_sig (completeness P Hb He) -> ~ ~ P x
Rabs_def2 : forall x a : R, Rabs x < a -> x < a /\ - a < x
Rabs_triang : forall a b : R, Rabs (a + b) <= Rabs a + Rabs b
boule_in_interval : forall x y z : R, x < z < y -> {c : R & {r : posreal | Boule c r z /\ x < c - r /\ c + r < y}}
is_lub = fun (E : R -> Prop) (m : R) => is_upper_bound E m /\ (forall b : R, is_upper_bound E b -> m <= b) : (R -> Prop) -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope]
CVU = fun (fn : nat -> R -> R) (f : R -> R) (x : R) (r : posreal) => forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> exists N : nat, forall (n : nat) (y : R), (N <= n)%nat -> Boule x r y -> Rabs (f y - fn n y) < eps : (nat -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> posreal -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope R_scope _]
boule_of_interval : forall x y : R, x < y -> {c : R & {r : posreal | c - r = x /\ c + r = y}}
compact_P3 : forall a b : R, compact (fun c : R => a <= c <= b)
derivable_pt_lim = fun (f : R -> R) (x l : R) => forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> exists delta : posreal, forall h : R, h <> 0 -> Rabs h < delta -> Rabs ((f (x + h) - f x) / h - l) < eps : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope _]
Rmin_left : forall x y : R, x <= y -> Rmin x y = x
Rnot_lt_le : forall r1 r2 : R, ~ r1 < r2 -> r2 <= r1
Rlt_not_le : forall r1 r2 : R, r2 < r1 -> ~ r1 <= r2
Rnot_le_lt : forall r1 r2 : R, ~ r1 <= r2 -> r2 < r1
Rle_not_lt : forall r1 r2 : R, r2 <= r1 -> ~ r1 < r2
Ball_in_inter : forall (c1 c2 : R) (r1 r2 : posreal) (x : R), Boule c1 r1 x -> Boule c2 r2 x -> {r3 : posreal | forall y : R, Boule x r3 y -> Boule c1 r1 y /\ Boule c2 r2 y}
